trans-unit.source: Represents a token that can be used to specify the context that should be used to correlate the exchange between a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ReceiveActivity" /> activity and the client that the activity is communicating with.
trans-unit.target: 代表一個權杖，可用來指定內容，應使用此內容來將 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ReceiveActivity" /> 活動與該活動所通訊的用戶端之間的交換相互關聯。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ContextToken" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ContextToken" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ContextToken" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ContextToken" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The name of the new instance.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ContextToken" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ContextToken" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個執行個體的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the name of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 代表這個執行個體之名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> associated with this context token.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定此內容權杖相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the name of the activity associated with this context token.
trans-unit.target: 代表與這個內容權杖有關聯之活動名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: A constant string that represents the root context.
trans-unit.target: 代表根內容的常數字串。

trans-unit.source: The value of this string is "(RootContext)".
